EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
VESSEL, 100 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
IN 33-20N 012-04E AT 090801Z JUN. VESSELS IN
VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
